definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: I showed up at the campsite one morning to find them loading their carts.
sentences.chinese: 一天早晨，我在营地发现他们正往大篷车里搬家什。

sentences.english: Paul left his convertible parked in the rain with the roof open.
sentences.chinese: 保罗把敞篷车停在雨中，车顶没关就离开了。

sentences.english: A convertible and a 4-wheel drive are also in the final design stage.
sentences.chinese: 敞篷车和四轮驱动车也已经进入设计的最后阶段。

sentences.english: A jest falls from the speechless caravan.
sentences.chinese: 寂静的大篷车传来一阵暴笑。

sentences.english: The car was an Oldsmobile convertible driven by Pollock.
sentences.chinese: 波洛克驾驶的是一辆奥兹莫比尔敞篷车。

sentences.english: Yes, yes he is, albeit I doubt he drives a mini-van.
sentences.chinese: 而且我猜他还开着小篷车呢。

sentences.english: Look, the Kramers are showing off in their new convertible.
sentences.chinese: 看，克拉梅一家在炫耀他们的新敞篷车。

sentences.english: They drive red convertibles with great stereos; to heck with the gas mileage.
sentences.chinese: 他们开带有音响的红色的敞篷车，耗费汽油费。

sentences.english: Christine and Darryl were staying at a caravan Park on Palmers Island.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯蒂和达瑞尔是住在大篷车公园帕尔默斯岛。

sentences.english: I would strongly recommend taking the gondola up and walking down.
sentences.chinese: 我会强烈推荐先坐敞篷车上山，然后步行下山。

sentences.english: Elisa stood in front of her wire fence watching the slow progress of the caravan.
sentences.chinese: 伊利莎站在铁栅栏前，看着大篷车慢慢走远。

sentences.english: Sometimes white vans appeared in the camp and took people away.
sentences.chinese: 有时候白篷车来带走一些人。

sentences.english: A wagon rumbled over the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一辆大篷车辘辘地驶过场地。

sentences.english: Can I borrow some money so we can move into an apartment and buy a new Mustang convertible?
sentences.chinese: 能不能借点儿钱给我买新房子和野马敞篷车？

sentences.english: The A3 Cabriolet features a lightweight soft-top that can be opened in 9 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 该a3级敞篷车的特点，一个轻型软顶可开9秒。

sentences.english: And this boy's singing songs about the boxcar ?
sentences.chinese: 而这孩子还在唱什么大篷车的歌？

definition: variant of 車廂|车厢[che1 xiang1]
person in charge of pack animals/chariot driver
